com.mousebird.maply

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.Scene
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobeScene, MapScene

    public class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Scene. Use either a MapScene or a GlobeScene instead.

      • addChanges

        public void addChanges(com.mousebird.maply.ChangeSet changes)

      • addShaderProgram

        public void addShaderProgram(Shader shader,
                    java.lang.String sceneName)
        Associate a shader with the given scene name. These names let us override existing shaders, as well as adding our own.
        Parameters:
        shader - The shader to add.
        sceneName - The scene name to associate it with.

      • teardownGL

        public void teardownGL()
        Tear down the OpenGL resources. Context needs to be set first.
